title: Snoop Dogg slams Kanye West's new Yeezy sandal design with epic takedown
text:

Snoop Dogg has slammed Kanye West's new Yeezy sandal design which are yet to be on the market.

The Gin and Juice rapper, 47, mocked the sliders, which are part of Kanye West's shoes designed for kids, after the Stronger rapper's wife Kim Kardashian uploaded footage of her children trying on the new footwear for her fans to see.

Following the upload to her story, US blogsite The Shade Room added the post to their Instagram account in order to ask their followers for their opinion on the plastic sandals and Snoop took to the comments with an epic takedown.

The 16.6 million strong social media account asked: "#TSRFashion: #KimKardashian gives us a look at #KanyeWest’s new #Yeezy slides for kids! How much do y’all think these cost, #Roomies?"

(Image: BPO)

Not holding back, Snoop, real name Calvin Cordozar Broadus Jr, took to the comments to rip the open-toed shoes to shreds because their likeness to shoes issued to prisoners in America.

He commented, in reference to Kim's recent work in petitioning for prison reform: "She been getting dudes out of jail now he gone sell jail slippers . W. T. F. None of my bidness."

He finished the caption with a frog emoji.

(Image: @theshaderoom/Instagram)

It is not the first time that Kanye's shoe designs have come under fire.

In September, his new Yeezy Foam Runners - which look vaguely like his trainers but made of foam and with loads of holes in - sent the internet into a frenzy.

The quirky shoes were compared to the most divisive shoes of all time - Crocs after the launch was announced on the Yeezy Mafia Twitter account with a picture of two models wearing the shoes on the back of a motorbike.

(Image: Getty Images for THR)

The account wrote: "YEEZY FOAM RUNNER LANDING IN 2020."

And the post instantly went viral, with hundreds of Twitter users mocking the shoes.

One tweeted: "I'd rather eat a pineapple pizza with a side of raisins than wear these."

"No one. Seriously NO ONE asked for Yeezy Crocs," another posted.

A third said: "Kanye: You know what’d be dope? We take Crocs. Aight. And we turn them into Yeezy's...And then we sell ‘em for $300."

"Kanye's making Yeezy Crocs now. Take me now Jeeeeesus," another agreed.

A fifth commented: "I can’t wait to be able to walk around in public in my regular $19.99 crocs and point and laugh at everyone wearing $399.99 Yeezy-Crocs."
description: The Drop It Like Its Hot hitmaker has likened the Goldigger rapper's new slip on sandal design to those given to prisoners
